project.description: * - Not implemented 1. Install fuel7.0 2. Deploy cluster HA (ceph, neutron, 3 compute) 3*. Populate cluster 4. Install octane 5. Create backup (master + repo) (upload backup to host machine) 6. Install fuel 8.0 7. Install octane 8*. Patch octane (Patchs ids) 9. Upload backup TODO

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: live migration
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Enable/disable live migration for upgrade compute node

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STABLE7_PATCHES
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: CRs for octane stable/7.0 (separated by space) For example: 288133 288134

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STABLE8_PATCHES
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: CRs for octane stable/8.0 (separated by space) For example: 288133 288134

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
. ${HOME}/.bash_profile
BUILD_ID=${CUSTOM_BUILD_ID:-${BUILD_ID}}
JOB_MD5SUM=`echo ${JOB_NAME} | md5sum - | cut -d" " -f1`
BUILD_DIR="${JOB_MD5SUM}-${BUILD_ID}"
export UPGRADE_FUEL_FROM=7.0 export UPGRADE_FUEL_TO=8.0 export LOGS_DIR=${HOME}/logs export KEYSTONE_PASSWORD=admin1 export UPDATE_MASTER=true
export ISO_PATH=${HOME}/iso/MirantisOpenStack-7.0.iso export NODES_COUNT=10 export ENV_NAME=case4_${BUILD_ID} export VENV_PATH=${HOME}/working_dir/fuel-devops-venv/ export FUEL_PROPOSED_REPO_URL="http://perestroika-repo-tst.infra.mirantis.net/mos-repos/centos/mos7.0-centos6-fuel/proposed/x86_64" export OCTANE_PATCHES="$STABLE7_PATCHES" cd ~
. ${VENV_PATH}/bin/activate
test -d ${BUILD_DIR} || { mkdir ${BUILD_DIR} }
cd $BUILD_DIR
cd fuel-qa || { git clone https://github.com/openstack/fuel-qa -b stable/7.0 cd fuel-qa
# XXX patch # fuel_7_change_smoke_workflow_patch | patch -p1
pip install -r ./fuelweb_test/requirements.txt --upgrade }
bash -x ./utils/jenkins/system_tests.sh -t test -w $(pwd) -j fuelweb_test -i $ISO_PATH -k -K -o --group=upgrade_smoke_backup unset OCTANE_PATCHES
cd .. export ENV_NAME=case4_${BUILD_ID} export ISO_PATH=${HOME}/iso/MirantisOpenStack-8.0.iso export FUEL_PROPOSED_REPO_URL="http://perestroika-repo-tst.infra.mirantis.net/mos-repos/centos/mos8.0-centos7-fuel/proposed/x86_64/" export UPDATE_MASTER=true export OCTANE_PATCHES="$STABLE8_PATCHES" export NODES_COUNT=10 cd fuel-qa8 || { git clone https://github.com/openstack/fuel-qa -b stable/8.0 fuel-qa8 cd fuel-qa8 fuel_octane_patches | patch -p1 # XXX patch # fuel_8_change_smoke_workflow_patch | patch -p1 }
bash -x ./utils/jenkins/system_tests.sh -t test -w $(pwd) -j fuelweb_test -i $ISO_PATH -k -K -o --group=upgrade_smoke_scale
